Title: Left Side of a Double-page Illuminated Incipit
Medium: ink and pigments on laid paper
Description: This folio from Walters manuscript W.562 is the left side of a double-page illuminated incipit for chapter 78 (Surat al-naba'). The inscription in the illuminated panels is verses 79-81 of chapter 56 (Surat al-waqi'ah). The panel inscription is written in the New Abbasid (Broken Cursive) style in gold on a blue ground with green arabesques.
Keywords: Arabic; Book; Calligraphy; Codex; Illumination; Iran; Islamic; Koran; Manuscript; Medallion; Ornament; Prayer; Qur`an; Scripture; Timurid; New Abbasid Style
Provenance: Henry Walters, Baltimore [date and mode of acquisition unknown]; Walters Art Museum, 1931, by bequest.
Creator: Iranian (?)
